sense.gloss: to confront (an issue), to face (up to something)

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑質問↑↓しつもん↓は|↑当面|↑↓とうめん↓の↑話題↑↓わだい↓とは↑関係↑↓かんけい↓がない。
sdata.e: Your question is not relevant to the subject.

sdata.j: そのプロジェクトはよく↑計画↑↓けいかく↓されていて↑興味深↑↓きょうみぶか↓いが、|↑当面|↑↓とうめん↓の↑利益↑↓りえき↓には↑大↑↓たい↓した↑結果↑↓けっか↓をもたらさないと↑見↑↓み↓られている。
sdata.e: The project is well-planned and interesting, but its immediate impact on the bottom line is not considered substantial.

sdata.j: これは|↑当面|↑↓とうめん↓の↑問題↑↓もんだい↓にとって↑大事↑↓だいじ↓な↑論拠↑↓ろんきょ↓だ。
sdata.e: This is an argument material to the question in hand.

sdata.e: The problem before us today is not a new one.

sdata.e: The biggest problem of the hour is unemployment.

sdata.e: The publication of the exam results over without incident, for the time being attention is naturally going to focus on the summer break, right?
